about_the_game:
Welcome to Cuprum 2929: A Living Island of the Future

In a distant future, remnants of Cyprus have transformed into Cuprum 2929, an autonomous island thriving through advanced AI and sustainable innovation. Here, gigantic AI-operated screens regulate life, while robots roam freely, embodying the pinnacle of human ingenuity.

A Disorienting Awakening
You play as a young kid who, after an ordinary evening of video games with their dog Pythagora, wakes up alone on the sandy shores of Cuprum 2929. With no memory of how they arrived and their beloved dog missing, panic sets in. The only way back to Pythagora and to uncover the truth of your sudden appearance on the island is through solving a series of complex puzzles scattered across key facilities.

Explore and Solve
Each location on the island — The Arcade, The Surveillance Center, and The Aquarium — offers unique challenges that blend environmental puzzles with narrative-driven objectives. These aren't just tests of skill; they are keys to unraveling the deeper story of the island's existence and your mysterious transportation to this tech-forward haven.

  • The Arcade: Dive into retro-futuristic game mechanisms that test logical and abstract thinking.
  • The Surveillance Center: Decode AI operations and manipulate surveillance systems to avoid detection!
  • The Aquarium: Interact with bio-engineered marine life and ecosystems that play integral roles in the island's sustainability, unlocking clues to your next steps.

Features Include:

  • An engaging single-player experience blending adventure, puzzle-solving, and a heartfelt quest.
  • Stunning visuals that depict a futuristic yet plausible world, combining lush landscapes with advanced urban technology.
  • A linear narrative that rewards exploration and intellectual curiosity with rich backstory and intricate world-building.

Prepare to question what you know about technology, companionship, and survival in this interactive, thought-provoking journey. Are you ready to unlock the secrets of Cuprum 2929 and find your way back to your friend?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.5.17
  • Processor: AMD Zen 2
  • Memory: 16 GB LPDDR5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.6GHz (1.6 TFlops FP32)

name: CUPRUM2929
short_description: After waking up disoriented near the sea, a young kid must navigate through an enigmatic city controlled by AI screens, searching for their missing dog, Pythagora. Solve intricate puzzles housed in unique locations and unravel the secrets of this advanced island and reunite with your companion.
